session_summary: Extended implementation to properly deploy skills to commands/ directory, updated CLI to handle subdirectories, and created claude-commands-expert skill as a meta-skill for this repository.

tasks.description: Create main skill.md file with dynamic loading approach
tasks.notes: Created msmodelutl-expert.md with dynamic loading of developer guide from ModelSEEDpy
Created three context files for quick reference

tasks.description: Copy msmodelutl-expert skill to commands/ directory
tasks.notes: Copied skill files from .claude/commands/ to commands/ (the source directory)

tasks.description: Update CLI to handle subdirectories with rglob
tasks.notes: Modified claude_commands.py to use rglob('*.md') instead of glob('*.md') for proper file counting and display of nested context files

tasks.description: Create claude-commands-expert skill for this repository
tasks.notes: Created meta-skill that provides expertise on the ClaudeCommands system itself

created.purpose: Condensed API quick reference with method tables
Common usage patterns with code examples
Guide for developing new commands and skills

modified.changes: Updated glob('*.md') to rglob('*.md') in 4 locations to properly count and display nested context files in skill subdirectories

comments: Skills are now properly located in commands/ directory (source of truth)
CLI updated to handle subdirectories - shows 'X commands + Y context files' when deploying
Expert skill pattern established: main .md file + optional context/ subdirectory
Dynamic loading approach: skills read documentation at invocation time for current info
Static context files: embedded patterns/references for fast access
Deploy to projects with: claude-commands update
